function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Potential spread of misinformation or incorrect data through the KG","Impact":"Misguided decision-making and public confusion","Mitigation":"Regular fact-checking and verification of information in the KG","Technologies":"Data validation algorithms, machine learning for fact-checking","People":"Researchers, public health officials, general public","Owner":"Research institutions, public health organizations"},{"Description":"Inadequate representation of COVID-19 topics in the KG","Impact":"Misunderstanding of the disease and its impacts","Mitigation":"Continuous updates and expansion of KG topics with current and accurate information","Technologies":"Natural language processing for topic modeling, data integration tools","People":"Researchers, healthcare professionals, policymakers","Owner":"Knowledge management teams, data curators"},{"Description":"Limited engagement and utilization of OpenKG-COVID19","Impact":"Missed opportunities for research and collaboration","Mitigation":"Promotion and outreach efforts to increase awareness and usage of the platform","Technologies":"Social media integration, user-friendly interfaces, targeted marketing","People":"Researchers, healthcare professionals, decision-makers","Owner":"Knowledge management teams, public health organizations"}]}
